artist: Artist: Benito Albi Bachini; Author: Carlo Collodi (Carlo Lorenzini)
description: gray soft cover book with blue line drawing of Pinocchio in center; red text on top and bottom; dark blue ribbon fastens at opening; nine loose prints inside held together with same dark blue ribbon; lender's archive #071

provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.

title: Le Avventure di Pinocchio
